attributes.action: alter the law so that families do not have to sell their family home in order to pay for the residential care of their relatives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Families who own their own homes are forced to sell them in order to pay for their care in a residential home, for example patients who suffer from Alzheimer's, Parkinsons disease, etc can be affected. If they do not own their home, ie rent it, their care is paid for by the state. Also in Scotland the state pay for the full time care of residents regardless of their estate. Is this fair?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
